name: PrimaryOpenAngleGlaucoma
title: Primary Open Angle Glaucoma
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for diagnoses of primary open-angle glaucoma (POAG).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of primary open-angle glaucoma (POAG) and open-angle glaucoma.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a diagnosis for 'unspecified eye.')
